doc:
Oliver Hudson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oliver_Hudson 0 Oliver Rutledge Hudson (born September 7, 1976) is an American actor. He is known for his roles as Adam Rhodes in the CBS comedy series Rules of Engagement (2007–2013), Jeff Fordham on the ABC musical drama series Nashville (2013–2015) and Wes Gardner in the Fox horror comedy Scream Queens. He is currently working on the ABC sitcom Splitting Up Together, produced by Ellen DeGeneres. Oliver_Rutledge_Hudson ( born September_7_,_1976 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known for his_roles as Adam_Rhodes in the_CBS_comedy_series_Rules of Engagement_(_2007 – 2013_) , Jeff_Fordham on the_ABC_musical_drama_series_Nashville_(_2013 – 2015_) and Wes_Gardner in the_Fox_horror_comedy_Scream_Queens . He is_currently_working on the_ABC_sitcom Splitting Up_Together , produced by Ellen_DeGeneres .
